pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit, Simulate and Diagnose Exponential-Family Models for Networks with Count Edges // A set of extensions for the 'ergm' package to fit weighted networks whose edge weights are counts. See Krivitsky (2012) doi:10.1214/12-EJS696 and Krivitsky, Hunter, Morris, and Klumb (2021) arXiv:2106.04997.
